purchases.desc: Manage plans and services purchased from the workspace where you are given with the master authority

info.title: Subscriptions
info.licenseExpireDateDesc: This is not an automatic payment but a license expiry date information when using the services.
info.nextPaymentDateDesc: This is the next payment date information when using the automatic payment service.

arStorage.usedDesc: It may differ from the actual remaining capacity so please use it as a reference.
arStorage.capacityDesc: Uploading is not possible if the capacity is exceeded and the remaining AR storage capacity will not be rolled over to the next month.

arContent.usedDesc: It may differ from the actual number of remaining view counts so please use it as a reference.
arContent.capacityDesc: When the Online AR views are all used AR content cannot be viewed further and the remaining views are not rolled over to the next month.

call.usedDesc: It may differ from the actual number of remaining minutes so please use it as a reference.
call.capacityDesc: When the Talk minutes are all used VIRNECT Remote cannot be used further and the remaining Talk minutes are not rolled over to the next month.
